name: Tupulaga Talavou Tula’i (3T’s) - Young generation “RISE UP”
description: 3 T’s is an intergenerational cultural enrichment program designed to build personal and collective interpersonal strength among PI children and youth residing citywide in San Francisco. Using traditional dances and songs, the goal is to provide youth with life skills that promote resilience; knowledge of their heritage that will inspire.
